alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 3:18AM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a glaze to around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence and Northern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Sunday evening into Monday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times and wet, especially late Sunday into Monday morning. Isolated power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
